WHYME.TITLE: Why me
WHYME.COPY: I solve complex frontend tasks with clean code and clear structure. User-friendly, pragmatic, modern—and always quick to find practical solutions.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.INTRO: Technologies and tools I use regularly.
SKILLS.QUESTIONS_HINT: Challenge me – I love learning new technologies.

ITEMS.title: Join
ITEMS.desc: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks with drag & drop, assign users and categories.

ITEMS.title: Pollo Loco
ITEMS.desc: Jump, run and throw game based on OOP. Help Pepe find coins and salsa to beat the crazy hen.

REFERENCES.HEADLINE: Need a team player? Here’s what my colleagues say about me.

ITEMS.name: Noah Mueller
ITEMS.text: Marcus had to develop, format and deliver content with the team. He is a reliable and friendly person.

ITEMS.name: Evelyn Marx
ITEMS.text: He is a trustworthy team player and can cope with deadlines. Structured work and clear code.

ITEMS.name: James Rugman
ITEMS.text: Reliable and friendly. Works in a structured way and writes clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.
